content: Reviewed opposing counsel's discovery responses. Several objections appear boilerplate and potentially waivable. Recommend meeting and conferring before filing motion to compel.
Agreed. Schedule a call with opposing counsel next week. If unproductive, we'll proceed with the motion.
Draft motion looks good. Just need to update the case citations in paragraph 5 based on the recent Supreme Court decision.
Deposition outline is about 70% complete. Need to review expert report one more time before finalizing the technical questions.
Expert conference call went extremely well. Dr. Engineering is confident in his analysis and will make an excellent witness. His report should be ready by end of week.
Client called with concerns about purchase price adjustment mechanism. Set up call for tomorrow at 2pm to discuss and potentially revise Section 2.3.
Reviewed the escrow agreement. Seller's counsel pushing for 12-month holdback instead of 18. Will discuss strategy with James before responding.
Client approved the property settlement agreement with minor changes to the furniture division. Making final edits now.
Opposing counsel indicated willingness to mediate. Client is open to it. Recommend proceeding with mediation before trial prep escalates costs.
Invoice is now 15 days overdue. Client hasn't responded to payment reminders. Recommend follow-up call from attorney.
Prosecutor offered plea deal: reduce to misdemeanor with probation. Client is considering. Meeting scheduled for Friday to discuss.
USPTO office action raises some prior art concerns. Will need to amend claims 1-3 and add detailed explanation. Calling client to discuss strategy.
Medical records review complete. Created 45-page chronology with key events highlighted. Several concerning deviations from standard of care identified.
Jennifer's chronology is excellent work. This clearly shows the chain of errors. Let's schedule a team meeting to discuss expert witness strategy.
Trademark search results show potential issues with pending application in same class. Need to review and advise client on likelihood of confusion analysis.
Plea negotiation memo drafted and ready for review. Included analysis of potential sentencing under different scenarios.
Site visit completed. Photos and measurements taken. Boundary dispute is more complex than initially thought - may need surveyor expert.
Approved. Expert's analysis was thorough and will be crucial for our case.
Bankruptcy petition filed successfully. 341 meeting scheduled for February 12. Client well-prepared and understands the process.
Immigration client has gathered most required documents. Still waiting on certified translation of foreign business records. Should arrive next week.
Seller pushed back on indemnification cap. May need to restructure escrow to address their concerns. Drafting alternative proposal.
Discovery responses look complete. Just need client to verify accuracy of financial information in responses to interrogatories 8-12.
Court evaluator scheduled home visits for both parents. Prepared client for what to expect. Visits scheduled for next week.
Deposition went very well. Plaintiff's testimony largely supports our defenses. Transcript should be expedited - critical for summary judgment motion.
Toxicology expert reviewed blood test results. His analysis supports our challenge to the test procedures. Should significantly strengthen motion to suppress.
